title: Well, I can't seem to get back into game after it crashed
body: I am too tired to be grumpy about how unfair it all is

replies.body: You are not the only one with this issue atm I myself am having the same probelm and i saw other posts about it as well

Yeah, riot doesn't seem to think anything is going on. Can you bump all of these posts so they get attention? 

I am also getting huge amounts of lag in game, are you getting simular issues atm?
